name: Chromaze
description:
Welcome To Chromaze.

In this 3D puzzle platformer, you are dealing with colored rays and the logic that reside behind it.

Most of you know Red Green and Blue, but you'll need to take advantage of them to go through all the levels.

This is still indevelopment and so the number of levels is growing. You can create your own level and upload it for everyone to test.

 Don't hesitate to join the discord https://discord.gg/jrSSBqpZ
